body.name: Kallabe Queen Size Bed Frame with 4 Stoarge Drawers and LED Lights, Adjustable Headboard, Upholstered Platform Bed with USB Charging Station, Strong Wooden Slats Support, Easy Assembly,White
body.stockDetail: Only 13 left in stock - order soon.
features: Elevate Your Sleeping Experience: Our LED bed frame boasts over 60,000 color options that can be controlled through the app or remote. The lights can change brightness, color, and mode, and sync with your music for a fun and relaxing atmosphere in your bedroom

4 Storage Drawers： Equipped with 4 large-capacity storage drawers underneath the bed frame. each with 4 smooth wheels that can be easily pulled out and closed, making it easy to store all kinds of bed linen, clothes, etc. Each drawer is also designed with a closing buckle, that prevents closed drawers from opening indiscriminately

Adjustable Headboard: Our upholstered headboard is made with soft PU leather and high-density sponge, providing a comfortable backrest for reading under the adjustable LED light feature. Choose from two height settings depending on the thickness of your mattress
Convenient Charging Station: The queen-size bed frame comes with USB ports conveniently located for easy device charging. Never worry about low battery again with this ultimate charging station

Sturdy & Easy Assembly: No need to worry about complicated assembly instructions or hiring a professional. Our bed frame comes with all the necessary parts and tools needed for assembly, and can be completed within an hour, even if you have no prior experience

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Led Headboard with Charging Station to bring more pleasure to your life You can choose the bed without any worry about thicknesses of different mattresses. The headboard can be adjusted from 41.3" to 45.3" to accommodate mattresses of different heights. 10''-12'' mattress recommended.

Make Selection Easier Built-in Power Strip Design The built-in power strip on the headboard has 2 USB ports, which is very convenient for you to charge your phone, tablet, headphones and other electronic devices. So you don't have to look around for charging stations anymore. Convenient Storage with 4 Practical Drawers Say goodbye to clutter and embrace a tidy bedroom. Our full size bed frame with storage is equipped with 4 all-inclusive drawers under-bed on wheels. Ideal for organizing off-season clothes, quilts, and smaller items, these drawers ensure your belongings are neatly stored away and prevent snags

LED lights can be controlled by a mobile app or a remote control You can freely set the brightness and color (more than 60,000 colors to choose from), and there are control modes such as style mode, music mode, microphone mode, and timing function waiting for you to explore. Let you design a unique light show according to your own preferences.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Drawers not connected
reviews.reviewText: I saw this bed and i loved the look of it, but there were no review so i decided to risk it and it is a very nice bed, it was pretty easy to put together it took me about an hour a half to put it together with just one person. Only thing I don’t like about the bed is that the drawers are not connected to the bed they just slide under it and they move around a bit. Other than that the leather is nice packaged well did not come damaged. the Led light are also bright.
